description: Retrieves the tags (keys and values) that are associated with an Amazon Security Lake resource: a subscriber, or the data lake configuration for your Amazon Web Services account in a particular Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Security Lake resource for which you want to retrieve the tags.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each tag (key and value) that's associated with the Amazon Security Lake resource.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The name of the tag. This is a general label that acts as a category for a more specific tag value ( value).

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value that's associated with the specified tag key ( key). This value acts as a descriptor for the tag key. A tag value cannot be null, but it can be an empty string.
